Question
========

----------
* (i) 14.68 and (ii) 18.55
* (i) 9.49 and (ii) 11.07
* (i) 6.25 and (ii) 10.64
* (i) 14.45 and (ii) 16.01

Solution
========

* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
